original_text: There is much trouble and pain now. But much worse things will happen! Now the fire burns slowly. But soon it will be like a fire that quickly burns dry wood!’
korean_text: 푸른 나무에도 이같이 하거든 마른 나무에는 어떻게 되리요 하시니라

sentences.original_text: There is much trouble and pain now
But much worse things will happen
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 훨씬 더 나쁜 일들이 일어날 것입니다

sentences.original_text: But soon it will be like a fire
